pullrequest.title: Add ability to control camera via messages

content.raw: The CameraPrivate.hh approach seems a little bit different from the approach you took with Event.hh, which included all the private implmentations in the main header file. As long as `class CameraPrivate;` is in Camera.hh, then everything is fine, even though CameraPrivate.hh is neither installed nor included from Camera.hh? Just making sure I understand what's going on.
